sentence.Network_en: I've quite forgotten how closed in London can seem.
sentence.Network_cn: 我都快忘了，伦敦有时看上去会多么地闭塞。

sentence.Network_en: He became so besotted with her that even his children were forgotten.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被她迷得神魂颠倒，连孩子都抛到了九霄云外。

sentence.Network_en: If your next record's a bit iffy, you're forgotten.

encyclopedia.content: 《Forgotten 》Linkin Park（林肯公园）歌曲简介 欧美金属乐队Linkin Park（林肯公园）的首张录音室专辑Hybrid Theory中的一首歌曲。专辑Hybrid Theory中的歌曲歌词都相当干净，没有任何脏话出现，这与其他的一些新金属乐队的歌曲形成了鲜明的对比。 作者简介 林肯公园（Linkin Park）是一组来自美国加州的摇滚乐队。 英文名：(前身为XERO,曾用Hybrid Theory，) 国籍/地区： 美国加利福尼亚 音乐风格：Metal-Hop锛埥鹗粑锛墶

entry.def: Forgotten is the past participle of forget .

sentences.sentence: "her aching muscles forgotten she danced all night"
"he was scolded for his forgotten chores"

Sentence.sentence: Unfortunately, most of the early popular African-American writers have been all but forgotten in modern times until now.
Why is it even interested in all those out-of-printlibrary books, most of which have been gathering dust on forgotten shelves for decades?
